articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Swiss say dozens of Russian spies disguised as diplomats are active in the Alpine nation - ABC News
articles.description: Switzerland’s main intelligence agency says Russia continues to have dozens of spies disguised as diplomats at its embassy in Bern and its mission to the United Nations in Geneva, making the Alpine nation a hotspot for Russian espionage activity in Europe
articles.content: BERLIN -- Switzerland's main intelligence agency says Russia continues to have dozens of spies disguised as diplomats at its embassy in Bern and its mission to the United Nations in Geneva, making th… [+1163 chars]
